description:
The colossal regenerating force of nature known as a hydra is headed straight for the town of Kaysehk, and with Ariane and Chiyome hunting down the beast`s master, only Arc can stand in it`s way.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: I Shall Cut Through the World`s Evils!
Ich werde das Übel der anderen Welt vernichten!
J’exterminerai le mal de ce monde !
Kono Yo no Aku o Ware wa Kiru!
Я прорвусь через зло этого мира!
異世界[このよ]の悪を我は斬る!
